testcase.classname: Register | users could register with new accounts
testcase.name: guest user could register with valid data successfully
testcase.system-out: Given user go to register page..............................................passed When user select gender type................................................passed And user enter first name and last name.....................................passed And user enter date of birthday.............................................passed And user enter date of birthmonth...........................................passed And user enter date of birthyear............................................passed And user enter email field..................................................passed And user fills Password fields..............................................passed And user clicks on register button..........................................passed Then success message is displayed...........................................passed

testcase.name: Logged user could add different products to Wishlist
testcase.system-out: Given user go to login page.................................................passed When user enter an existing email...........................................passed And user enter an valid password............................................passed And user clicks on login button.............................................passed And user hover "Computers" category.........................................passed And user click on sub-category..............................................passed And user clicks on "Add To Wishlist" button2................................passed And user clicks on "Add To Wishlist" button1................................passed Then add wishlist message is displayed......................................passed

testcase.name: user could login with invalid email and password

testcase.name: User could reset his/her password successfully
